lessonGuidance: A common example of the previous pattern is the 1 in the corner. In this situation, the tile numbered 1 only borders one hidden tile and no flags. This guarantees the hidden tile is a mine and it can be flagged.

instructions: Using the information about the pattern you just learned, FLAG each tile that you know 100% is a mine going from top left to bottom right of the board. Click the "Next" button at the bottom right of your screen when you are done.
